extendedInfo.description: Say hello to better banking with the moneto prepaid MasterCardÂ® App.NO CREDIT CHECK. Register from the App and receive your FREE moneto MasterCard in the mail. Load funds to your card (remember, it is a prepaid card) and start enjoying all the unique moneto features:-LOAD FUNDS: ask your employer to set up Direct Deposit to your card, or load it with cash using a GreenDot MoneyPak or at any MoneyGram locations. moneto also accepts PayPal transfers and bank transfers.-SEND MONEY anywhere in the world to anyone directly from your phone through the built-in MoneyGram service. Money will be available within 10 minutes for pick-up in Mexico, China, Philippines, Costa Rica, etc. And as an added benefit, you can transfer money for FREE to any other moneto users.-CASHBACK in 60 seconds: Your card comes preloaded with weekly offers. No need to buy coupons or register. We will credit CASH instantly on your card when you swipe your moneto card for a qualifying purchase. Most other CASHBACK programs credit your account 30 to 45 days after your purchase. You can save instantly 10, 20 or even 30% at over 600 participating merchants such as Target, Taco Cabana, NAPA Auto parts, Boston Market and many of your local stores â some offers are geo-located for your neighborhood! -REALTIME BALANCE update: check your balance free and instantly before you pay ï-REALTIME TRANSACTION HISTORY: control your money. See details in the app before you leave the store and make sure you never get charged twice for the same purchase!-BILL PAY: pay any bills directly from our web self-care-ATM: withdraw money at our Surcharge-FREE moneyPass network (16,000+ ATM in the country)-24/7 FREE LIVE CUSTOMER SERVICE in both English and Spanish-NFC upgrade: unique to the moneto mobile experience you can upgrade your account for mobile payments. This service is done through a microSD (for Android) or a protective iCaisse (for iPhone) ready for MasterCard PayPass payments. This means you can use your phone as your card and pay for everyday items with a tap of your phone!moneto is accepted globally where MasterCard debit is accepted. moneto is FDIC insured and carries MasterCard's limited liability pledge so you can relax knowing your money is safe.Keywords: prepaid, no credit check, send money, cash back, NFC

reviews.comment: I talked to someone about this with the Droid Razr and was told which sd card to get. I have the sticker in a good place but the payment doesn\'t send. The NFC payment pad makes a sound but nothing happens on the phone. Some payment terminals ask for card swipe after the pad rings. Maybe no jelly bean support ? Haven\'t tried on ics.  Update: Getting support from Facebook page administrator.
reviews.author: Jonathan Trejo

reviews.title: Nice wallet
reviews.comment: I love leaving home knowing everything is now on my cell phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great and very useful
reviews.comment: It\'s a very fantastic way to spend money and not having to carry around your wallet all the ttime is very helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t use existing CC, must provide personal info
reviews.comment: You can\'t use this app and link an existing credit/debit card.  Instead, you must open an account with them; this requires giving them your personal information such as SSN, DOB, etc and paying their monthly fee.  Their privacy policy says they will share your personal information with 3rd parties for \"joint marketing\" purposes and will continue to do so even after you close your account.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC HD2 <--------- ; )
reviews.comment: Working on my HTC HD2 but only on Ice Cream Sammy. Sorry couldn\'t make it work on Cyano.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App of the future
reviews.comment: Paying with your phone?  Awesome.  This is the future, now!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nfc enabled phones
reviews.comment: Why doesn\'t this work with phones that are already nfc enabled?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yeah right!
reviews.comment: This app isn\'t that great. All kinds of fees added to the card. Only thing that doesn\'t cost money is you putting money into the account (ras) run away screaming
reviews.author: Rod talley

reviews.title: App works well.
reviews.comment: App is fine but limitations of storage capacity plus cost of microSD is a deal buster.
reviews.author: Jonathan Morley

reviews.title: Poor.... and disapointing
reviews.comment: Must but their chip to use and wont work on nfc enabled devices.... real shame i had high hopes!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Should not require SD card
reviews.comment: You should not have people who already have NFC on their phones forced to buy the SD Card. I would like try this with my Galaxy Nexus and My mom would like to use it with her T-mobile GSII which has a NFC chip in it already. Please fix this. So far it looks like wallet is still the king.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for international travels
reviews.comment: No currency exchange fee and able to check my transactions within seconds
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Great app that allows people who are wanting to up their credit score, doesn\'t have a bank account, no credit check and the lowest cost compared to any other prepaid card out there
reviews.author: A Google User
